question: A friend of yours is thinking of going on a camping holiday for the first time this summer. He/she has asked for your advice.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter•	Explain why you think your friend would enjoy a camping holiday.•	Describe some possible disadvantages.•	Say whether you would like to go camping with your friend this summer.
text: Hope you are safe and healthy. Just writing this letter to answer your enquires.

It is good to hear that you are ready to kick off your camping holiday. I promise you that you will fall in love with such  an activity because it is an adventurous and existing experience. You will have a memorable holiday with your family members.

Speaking of the preparation for the camping holiday,  you may need to leave  at least 2 weeks for it before departure. There is a very complicated process as you have to do grocery shopping, packing up all items in advance. It is very costly considering how much you need to pay for accommondation and food.
